availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky farm laborer. Ohio native. Married Sarah Jane Middaugh Davis in 1860.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-029-0583. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 14. “Joseph Davis (1838-1907),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 149047902, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=149047902&ref=acom (accessed June 15, 2017). Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900, Greenup County, 1860.
